mapper.select: SELECT ic.id,ic.name,ic.method_type,ic.type,ic.event,ic.parameter,ic.description,ic.url,ic.sequence,ic.is_deleted,ic.created_at,ic.created_by,ic.updated_at,ic.updated_by,ib.name AS brand,ib.key,ib.secret FROM interface_config ic LEFT JOIN interface_brand ib ON ib.id = ic.brand WHERE ic.id != #{0}
